00030 // The enum, name and value of the enum for the Cluster Mode
00031 enum EClusterMode
00032 {
00033         NONE = 0,
00034         FJ_exclusive_yCut = 1,          // exclusive clustering mode implemented in FastJet
00035         FJ_exclusive_nJets = 2,         // exclusive clustering mode implemented in FastJet
00036         FJ_inclusive = 4,               // inclusive "-"
00037         OWN_inclusiveIteration = 8      // use FJ inclusive Clustering, but iterate until we have the desired number of jets
00038 };
00039
